pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bottom-Up Proteomics and LiP-MS Quality Control and Data Analysis Tools // Useful functions and workflows for proteomics quality control and data analysis of both limited proteolysis-coupled mass spectrometry (LiP-MS) (Schopper et al. (2017) doi:10.1038/nprot.2017.100) and regular bottom-up proteomics experiments. Data generated with search tools such as 'Spectronaut', 'MaxQuant' and 'Proteome Discover' can be easily used due to flexibility of functions.
